This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS The constructor non-conformatly uses API decorated with the [CEReactions] when constuctor is invoked during upgrade 
PASS The constructor non-conformatly uses API decorated with the [CEReactions] when constructor is invoked with new 
PASS Upgrading an element with a throwing constructor should rethrow that exception 
PASS Upgrading an element with constructor that returns different object 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
